author: Juan Manuel Cantillo A.
title: Así está la tabla de posiciones en la Liga BetPlay tras la goleada de Junior
text:
Tras la goleada este miércoles 4 goles por 1 frente al Unión Magdalena, en el Estadio Metropolitano Roberto Meléndez, el equipo Junior de Barranquilla asumió el liderato del Torneo Finalización de la Liga BetPlay Dimayor.
El conjunto barquillero se impuso con goles de Jesús Rivas, Yimmi Chará, un autogol de Nicolás Ramírez y un gol de tiro libre de José Enamorado; mientras que por el conjunto samario descontó Janilson Sarmiento.
El compromiso disputado, este miércoles tuvo como novedad la expulsión de Jermein Peña, jugador de Junior, por supuestamente agredir a un rival durante el compromiso. Lea aquí: Junior goleó al Unión Magdalena y es líder de la Liga colombiana
El equipo Junior de Barranquilla ha convertido 9 goles en los tres partidos disputado hasta el momento en la liga BetPlay Dimayor, pero también ha recibido tres.
Otros resultados de la tercer fecha de la Liga BetPlay
En la jornada también se destaca por el triunfo del Deportivo Pereira frente al Atlético Nacional, 2 goles por 1 en el estadio Hernán Ramírez Villegas de la capital risaraldense.
También en la victoria de visitantes de Deportes Tolima 0-1 ante Alianza Valledupar, en el estadio Armando Maestre Pavajeau de la capital cesarense.
Llaneros FC derrotó 2 goles por 1 a Boyacá Chicó, en el estadio Bello Horizonte Rey Pelé de Villavicencio.
Independiente Santa Fe empató de local 0-0 frente a Águilas Doradas en el estadio Nemesio Camacho El Campín.
Y en el último partido de la jornada de este miércoles, se enfrentaron La Equidad y Millonarios con resultado final 1-0 en el estadio Metropolitano de Techo.
Así está la tabla de posiciones en la Liga BetPlay
Teniendo en cuenta estos resultados parciales, tenemos que Junior de Barranquilla es el líder de la tabla de posiciones con 9 puntos, luego están Atlético Nacional y Fortaleza con 6 unidades cada uno.
Santa Fe y Llaneros FC suman 5 puntos cada uno; Boyacá Chicó, Deportivo Pereira, La Equidad y Alianza FC tienen cuatro unidades cada uno.
Mientras que Deportivo Pasto y Deportes Tolima suman 3 puntos; Águilas Dorada, llegó a dos puntos con el empate del último partido.
Lo que viene en la Liga BetPlay Dimayor
La jornada continúa este jueves con los partidos entre Independiente Medellín ante el Deportivo Envigado y luego Deportivo Cali Recibe a Fortaleza en su estadio Palmaseca de Palmira. Siga leyendo: Liverpool rompe el mercado con fichaje millonario para su delantera
Los partidos Bucaramanga ante Once Caldas y Deportivo Pasto contra América de Cali fueron aplazados para nueva fecha.

author: @prokerala
title: Cold wave conditions in five Bengal districts, says MeT office
text:
Kolkata, Dec 13 : The Regional Meteorological Office in Kolkata has predicted cold wave conditions in five districts of West Bengal for the next two days.
These five districts are East Burdwan, West Burdwan, Bankura, Purulia and Birbhum. Cold wave is a situation when either temperature after sunset scales down below 10 degrees Celsius or minimum temperature is below the normal levels by 5 degrees Celsius.
At the same time, dense fog has been predicted in the next few days in the five districts in the northern sector of West Bengal namely Darjeeling, Jalpaiguri, Alipurduar, Cooch Behar and North Dinajpur. Fog has also been predicted in certain districts in South Bengal -- Purulia, Bankura and West Burdwan -- in the early morning hours.
Even the state capital Kolkata has started to feel the pinch of cold wind since Thursday. The maximum temperature in Kolkata on Thursday was 24.3 degrees Celsius, which was 2.7 degrees lower than the normal level.
The minimum temperature in Kolkata on Thursday was 13.8 degrees Celsius, which was 2.3 degrees lower than the normal level. The maximum and minimum relative humidity in the city on Thursday were 96 per cent and 40 per cent respectively.
The Regional Meteorological Office has predicted maximum and minimum temperatures in Kolkata to scale down further during the next couple of days. As per weather office productions, on Friday the maximum and minimum temperatures in Kolkata will be around the same as it was on Thursday.
Meanwhile, the latest average Air Quality Index (AQI) index in Kolkata has been recorded at 285, which comes in the "purple" or "very unhealthy" category.
Environmentalists and doctors have advised children and people with respiratory problems to avoid outdoor activities during this period as far as possible. The AQI levels, like every year, started deteriorating after Kali Puja and Diwali in October and the deterioration is continuing.

author: Ituriel Pérez
title: ¡Gilda Guadalupe Cota logra Plata en París 2024! - Periódico AM
text: [SuperDeportivo](https://www.am.com.mx/superdeportivo)el ¡Gilda Guadalupe Cota logra Plata en París 2024! En la prueba de impulso de bala la mexicana se colgó la presea plateada. Con un espectacular desempeño, la mexicana Gilda Guadalupe Cota Vera debutó en los Juegos Paralímpicos de París 2024 al colgarse la presea de plata en la prueba de Impulso de Bala F33. La exponente mexicana nativa de Yucatán, hizo gala de su experiencia y talento para adentrarse de lleno en la competencia y a la postre garantizar un nuevo metal para la delegación azteca. Se trató de una ardua prueba en la que con distancia de 7.89 tras la ejecución de seis lanzamientos aseguró esta nueva alegría para el pueblo mexicano. La lanzadora batalló al inicio al tener incluso su segundo lanzamiento como no válido, sin embargó, recuperó su nivel y regresó un extraordinario lanzamiento en su tercer intento con 7.31m . De esta forma el Oro fue para la china Wu Qing, la Plata para la mexicana y el Bronce para la rusa Svetlana Krivenok. Destacada historia Especialista en criminalística, la atleta mexicana tuvo un giro rotundo en su vida al ser diagnosticada con esclerosis múltiple, sin embargo, su temple y gran actitud ante esta situación la hizo esforzarse hasta llegar a los más altos niveles competitivos y obtener grandes triunfos, siendo un auténtico ejemplo de vida y superación. [SuperDeportivo](https://www.am.com.mx/superdeportivo)el

author: Rose Davis
title: Global Water Security Center receives $2.4 million Grant
text:
The Global Water Security Center (GWSC) at The University of Alabama (UA), with partners in Tufts University (TU) and Oregon State University (OSU), has recently received a $2.4 million dollar grant from the U.S. Department of Defense’s Minerva Research Initiative.
Brian C. Britt, Ph.D., Jameson L. Hayes, Ph.D., and Matthew S. VanDyke, Ph.D., associate professors of advertising and public relations, will work with the Tufts University’s digital humanities natural language processing specialist, Peter Nadel, to develop new ways to use news and social media to identify conflict and cooperation events.
“We’re excited to use news and social media data to better understand the impacts of shocks to the water system,” VanDyke said. “This should afford a more comprehensive assessment that includes social factors that may influence subnational and international cooperation and conflict around water issues.”
The Minerva Research Initiative will collect data on water conflict and cooperation events, evaluate how to efficiently buffer societies from shocks to their water system and measure the social unrest that comes from it. These insights will help the government anticipate and create well-informed policies and plans that work better with local people. In other words, the initiative will collect data on water shortage responses, such as local news, that better inform governmental response and aid.
The U.S. government continues to emphasize how water-driven risk affects political stability, but biophysical data, such as climate or land use data, are insufficient to identify areas at risk for water conflict.
“We see over and over that water is at the heart of many national security issues, yet even the best water scarcity data can’t tell us where conflict or cooperation will occur,” said Kate Brauman, Ph.D., the GWSC’s deputy director and principal investigator. “By taking into account events where water shocks lead to conflict or cooperation, we can better anticipate where and when water disturbances will have negative impacts.”
Dr. Melissa McCracken, Ph.D., assistant professor of international environmental policy at Tufts University, will lead the development of new conceptual models of societal resilience and its ability to reduce conflict with human-environmental systems. McCracken said that “by combining theory building with empirical research, [the Minerva Research Initiative] critically expands our understanding of which societal resilience factors are most important for cooperation in the face of disturbances to freshwater resources.”
The project team will develop new methods to overcome persistent barriers in monitoring conflict-cooperation outcomes, leveraging recent developments in machine learning, generative AI and large language models.
At Oregon State University, Aaron Wolf, Ph.D. will lead OSU’s contribution to water conflict analysis and cooperation based on the Transboundary Water Diplomacy Database (TFDD). Susanne Schmeier, Ph.D., affiliate faculty at OSU and associate professor of water law and diplomacy at IHE Delft – Institute of Water Education in the Netherlands, will contribute her academic and diplomacy experiences in water conflict and cooperation, with a particular focus on the legal and institutional mechanisms for water conflict and cooperation at both the international and subnational scales.
The GWSC translates water and environmental science to help key global decision makers improve security at the intersection of water, energy, food and health. For more information, visit their website.

author: Jada Kennzie
title: At risk for type 2 diabetes? Meet the Noom diabetes prevention program
text:
According to the CDC , 1 in 3 Americans have prediabetes and more than 80% don’t even realize it. For many of those Americans, prediabetes can develop into type 2 diabetes within 5 years.
In its continuing effort to provide preventative health solutions, Noom recently launched a Diabetes Prevention Program , which is designed to support those at risk for type 2 diabetes.
Noom Diabetes Prevention Program Noom's Diabetes Prevention Program aims to reduce the risk of type 2 diabetes by helping users develop healthier habits.
Learn more about the Noom Diabetes Prevention Program What is type 2 diabetes? Type 2 diabetes is a health condition that affects 90 to 95% of the 38 million Americans living with diabetes, characterized by high level of sugar (glucose) in the blood. It occurs when when your body can’t use insulin properly, a hormone that regulates blood glucose, resulting in hyperglycemia, or high blood sugar. Chronic hyperglycemia can cause damage to nerves, blood vessels, and organs, and lead to serious health conditions.
Can you reverse type 2 diabetes? While there is no cure for type 2 diabetes, there are ways to prevent or delay it with lifestyle changes like eating a healthier diet and exercising regularly, even if you're at high risk.
What is a Diabetes Prevention Program? A Diabetes Prevention Program is a partnership of public and private organizations that work to prevent or delay type 2 diabetes. The programs allow people at risk for type 2 diabetes to engage in evidence-based lifestyle change programs meant to reduce the risk of type 2 diabetes.
What to know about the Noom Diabetes Prevention Program Credit: Noom Noom's new Diabetes Prevention Program is one of just 11 digital programs with a CDC Full Plus Recognition.
It's a CDC-recognized DPP program The Noom Diabetes Prevention Program is a CDC-recognized Diabetes Prevention Program that's earned a CDC Full Plus Recognition , which is the highest honor, and it's one of just 11 digital programs nationwide to receive this recognition. With the new program, Noom is committed to providing sustainable solutions for diabetes prevention through improved eating habits, physical activity, stress management, emotional eating, sleep hygiene, and more.
It helps you create a diabetes meal plan Every time users log into the Noom app, their information will automatically be shared with their personal Diabetes Prevention Program coach who will continually monitor their progress. The coach will use their health information to guide them in making healthier eating choices by balancing their eating plan. The Diabetes Prevention Program coach will be a partner on the challenging but rewarding path to a healthier and happier lifestyle.
It's a 12-month plan Noom's Diabetes Prevention Program is meant to be a 12-month plan that's broken down into two essential periods: months 1-6 and months 7-12. The first six months will focus on nutrition and physical activity with weekly communications with a Diabetes Prevention Program coach, while the last six months will involve in-depth behavioral topics like stress, sleep, and emotional eating with support from your coach and group.
Over 12 months, users should move through four key stages: learning, practice, advanced learning, and mastery. They'll have access to various resources on their journey that include easy-to-follow tasks, progress monitoring, inspiring feedback, and individualized support. Each day will begin with a simple plan with a customized list of steps to help them reach their goal. They'll also have Noom's innovative technology, predictive algorithms, and intuitive food portions at their disposal.
Learn about the Noom Diabetes Prevention Program
Related content feature Seasonal allergies stink—find out if this nasal spray can help review Reebok NanoX4 review

author: Staff Report
title: Driver of noisy Camaro dials 911 after pulled over by police officer
text:
The driver of a noisy Camaro dialed 911 after he was pulled over by a police officer.
Javon Antwon Baker, 22, who lives at The Cove apartments in Lady Lake, was driving a silver Chevy Camaro at 9:30 a.m. Sunday on U.S. Hwy. 27 at Banana Street when he was “pushing the accelerator making the exhaust emit noise louder than 25 feet away,” according to an arrest report from the Lady Lake Police Department.
During a traffic stop, Baker became “belligerent.” He demanded that a sergeant be summoned to the scene of the traffic stop. Baker said he “wasn’t going to jail” and dialed 911. He was warned he would be making a non-emergency call to 911, which is against the law. Baker made the call despite the warning.
Baker was ordered to get out of his car, but despite numerous requests, he would not budge from the Camaro.
He was removed from the vehicle and arrested on charges of misuse of 91 and resisting arrest. He was booked at the Lake County Jail and released after posting $2,000 bond.
Baker was arrested in 2023 after allegedly swiping money from the Jackpot Casino in Tavares.

author: @Masrawy
title: لابيد لنتنياهو: لقد بعت جنودنا من أجل البقاء أسبوع أو ثلاثة في الحكم | مصراوى
text:
وكالات
قال زعيم المعارضة الإسرائيلية يائير لابيد، الخميس، إن المعارضة لن تمنح أحزاب الحريديم استراحة للدفع باتجاه سن قانون للتهرب من الخدمة العسكرية.
وفي خطاب موجّه إلى حكومة الاحتلال الإسرائيلي، قال لابيد: "لقد بعتم جنود جيش الاحتلال الإسرائيلي من أجل البقاء أسبوع أو ثلاثة في الحكم"، مضيفا "في هذه الليلة بدأ تفكك الائتلاف الحاكم في إسرائيل".
ورفض النواب الإسرائيليون في الساعات الأولى من صباح الخميس، بأغلبية ضئيلة، اقتراح قانون قدمته المعارضة لحل الكنيست، وبالتالي تنظيم انتخابات تشريعية مبكرة.
وصوت 61 نائبا من أصل 120 يتألف منهم الكنيست ضد اقتراح القانون في هذه القراءة التمهيدية، بينما أيده 53 نائبا.
وكانت المعارضة قدمت هذا النص في ظل انقسام الأغلبية الحكومية حول التجنيد الإجباري لليهود المتدينين، وكانت تسعى لأن تسقط الحكومة من خلال استمالة الأحزاب الدينية المتشددة المتحالفة مع رئيس الوزراء بنيامين نتنياهو.

author: Elena Mandacen
title: MANGO OUTLET LENCERÍA Cinco 'joyas' rebajadas que hemos encontrado entre las novedades de lencería de Mango Outlet (¡puro placer!)
text:
Ideales para conseguir un look más atrevido y sensual.
La lencería no es solo para momentos especiales, sino para nuestro día a día / Mango Outlet Elena Mandacen - 31/5/2024, 8:03 La lencería ha sido siempre un componente esencial en el armario de cualquier mujer , pero a menudo subestimamos su impacto en la creación de un look atrevido y sensual. Más allá de su función básica , tiene el poder de transformar , no solo nuestra imagen, sino también nuestra actitud y confianza . Cuando pensamos en seducir , lo primero que se nos viene a la mente son vestidos ajustados, sandalias con tacones altos y un maquillaje llamativo.
Sin embargo, la verdadera base de este look comienza con la lencería adecuada . Desde un sujetador de encaje, unas braguitas tipo tanga que se ajusten perfectamente, un camisón de seda o un collar de cuerpo. Todos ellos pueden hacer maravillas , especialmente en la forma en la que nos sentimos con lo que llevamos puesto. De ahí que sea inevitable y necesario echar un vistazo en la sección de lencería de Mango Outlet , donde siempre encontramos auténticas joyas a precios muy rebajados . Prendas y tendencias que no solo son estéticamente atractivas , sino que también desafían las normas tradicionales de la moda , permitiéndonos expresar nuestra individualidad y estilo único.

author: Joe Lawlor
title: Influenza spreading fast in Maine
text:
Influenza has begun to spread more rapidly in Maine, with case counts nearly doubling in one week. Maine reported 510 cases for the week ending Dec. 23 – the latest data available – up from 260 flu cases the previous week.
Dr. Puthiery Va, director of the Maine Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, said influenza cases will continue to spike and likely peak sometime in January or February.
“We would expect flu cases to increase in the coming
weeks,” Va said. “What is reassuring is the current influenza vaccine is going to be effective. If you haven’t gotten your flu shot yet, go ahead and get your flu shot. It’s not too late.”
Scientists modify the formulation for the flu vaccine every season, attempting to predict what types of influenza strains are likely to be most common for the upcoming season. In Maine and the U.S., the predominant strain so far this season is Influenza A, which tends to cause more severe symptoms in adults and less severe symptoms in children. Influenza B strains tend to be less severe in adults and cause worse symptoms in children.
Influenza peaked earlier last winter, in late December, and Maine recorded a total of 16,309 cases of influenza for the 2022-23 season. Flu season runs from October to May, and Va said Maine is now trending toward a more typical peak of January or February.
Despite the one-week jump in infections, Maine still has low levels of influenza, according to the U.S. CDC. But there are high levels in nearby states, including Massachusetts, New York, and New Jersey. The entire Southeast region is experiencing high levels of influenza, as are some western states, including California and Arizona.
So far this season, 73 people have been hospitalized with influenza in Maine, and two people have died.
For those who haven’t yet received their flu shot, there is still time to protect yourself against the dangerous virus. Influenza can be especially severe for older people, pregnant women, young children, and infants. Common symptoms of the flu include fever, chills, cough, sore throat, runny or stuffy nose, body aches, headaches, and fatigue.
Va said for those who haven’t received the updated COVID-19 vaccine, she recommends getting both during the same appointment. Side effects are not any worse for those who get both vaccines at the same time.
A vaccine for another respiratory virus, RSV, is recommended for those 60 and older and women who are 32 to 36 weeks pregnant. Va said since infectious disease cases are growing rapidly, she said for those who qualify for the RSV vaccine, it would be a good idea to get all three immunizations at the same appointment.
The vaccines are widely available at pharmacies or primary care doctors’ offices. Maine stopped tracking COVID-19 vaccinations, but nationally, about 40% of the population gets a flu shot every year, while only about 18% have gotten the updated COVID-19 vaccine. Maine had immunized more than 80% of its population during the initial rollout of the COVID-19 vaccine in 2021, but fewer people have gotten subsequent booster shots and updated vaccines that more closely match circulating strains.
COVID-19
cases are also prevalent throughout New England right now, with wastewater testing showing high levels in much of Maine, including Cumberland and York counties. The JN.1 subvariant, an offshoot of the omicron strain, is the predominant circulating strain.
There are 93 patients hospitalized in Maine for COVID-19. Hospitalizations have increased in recent months from about 40-50 patients in September and October.

author: Larissa Carvalho
title: Conheça as novas cortinas inteligentes da Xiaomi, que prometem revolucionar
text:
A Xiaomi continua a expandir seu portfólio de produtos, introduzindo recentemente as Mijia Hidden Smart Curtains no mercado chinês. Esta linha é parte do segmento de casa conectada da marca, que visa oferecer soluções inteligentes e discretas para o lar. As cortinas inteligentes foram projetadas para serem praticamente invisíveis, graças a um motor compacto de apenas 5,5 cm de altura, permitindo sua instalação em qualquer caixa de cortina.
O sistema opera de forma silenciosa, emitindo menos de 30 dB, e é capaz de suportar cortinas de até 50 kg, graças ao motor de 1,5 N·m. Com três velocidades de movimentação, as cortinas podem ser abertas ou fechadas a uma velocidade de até 8 cm por segundo. A operação pode ser realizada através do aplicativo Xiaomi Home, comandos de voz ou manualmente, proporcionando flexibilidade e conveniência aos usuários.
Como funciona o sistema de cortinas inteligentes da Xiaomi?
O sistema de cortinas inteligentes da Xiaomi é projetado para ser integrado a outros dispositivos inteligentes da casa. Utilizando o HyperOS, é possível automatizar a operação das cortinas e coordená-las com outros elementos, como acender as luzes ao fechar as cortinas. Este nível de automação é ideal para usuários que buscam uma experiência de casa conectada mais integrada e funcional.
O dispositivo pode ser configurado individualmente ou em conjunto com outro motor para cortinas de dois lados. No entanto, é importante notar que o sistema suporta apenas trilhos retos, o que pode exigir adaptações para certos tipos de cortinas, como as de ilhós. Trilhos em formato de L e U não são compatíveis, o que pode limitar algumas opções de instalação.
Quais são as opções de instalação e preço?
Disponíveis para compra na China, as Mijia Hidden Smart Curtains vêm com a opção de instalação profissional gratuita, sem a necessidade de trilhos pré-instalados. Este serviço é um atrativo adicional para consumidores que buscam conveniência e eficiência na instalação de novos dispositivos inteligentes em suas casas.
O preço do dispositivo é de 599 yuan, aproximadamente R$ 473 em conversão direta, sem considerar impostos ou taxas adicionais. Este preço competitivo reflete a estratégia da Xiaomi de oferecer produtos acessíveis que combinam funcionalidade e design minimalista, atraindo principalmente usuários urbanos que valorizam essas características.
Expansão do Portfólio de Produtos da Xiaomi
Nos últimos meses, a Xiaomi tem diversificado seu catálogo com o lançamento de diversos produtos voltados para o lar. Além das cortinas inteligentes, a empresa introduziu um novo purificador de água, um massageador e uma cafeteira de cápsulas. Esta estratégia de diversificação visa atender às necessidades de um público cada vez mais interessado em soluções tecnológicas para o dia a dia.
Com um foco claro em funcionalidade e estética, a Xiaomi continua a se posicionar como uma líder no mercado de dispositivos inteligentes, oferecendo produtos que não apenas melhoram a vida cotidiana, mas também se integram harmoniosamente ao ambiente doméstico.
